verses.verse: My brothers, <S%G80><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not the faith <S%G4102><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Lord of glory, <S%G1391><s%> with respect <S%G4382><s%> of persons. <S%G4382><s%>

For if <S%G1437><s%> there come <S%G1525><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> assembly <S%G4864><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> with a gold <S%G5554><s%> ring, <S%G5554><s%> in goodly <S%G2986><s%> apparel, <S%G2066><s%> and there come <S%G1525><s%> in also <S%G2532><s%> a poor <S%G4434><s%> man in vile <S%G4508><s%> raiment; <S%G2066><s%>

And you have respect <S%G1914><s%> to him that wears <S%G5409><s%> the gay <S%G2986><s%> clothing, <S%G2066><s%> and say <S%G2036><s%> to him, Sit <S%G2521><s%> you here <S%G5602><s%> in a good <S%G2573><s%> place; and say <S%G2036><s%> to the poor, <S%G4434><s%> Stand <S%G2476><s%> you there, <S%G1563><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> sit <S%G2521><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> my footstool: <S%G5286><s%>
Are you not then <S%G2532><s%> partial <S%G1252><s%> in yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> and are become <S%G1096><s%> judges <S%G2923><s%> of evil <S%G4190><s%> thoughts? <S%G1261><s%>

Listen, <S%G191><s%> my beloved <S%G27><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> Has not God <S%G2316><s%> chosen <S%G1586><s%> the poor <S%G4434><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> in faith, <S%G4102><s%> and heirs <S%G2818><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he has promised <S%G1861><s%> to them that love <S%G25><s%> him?
But you have despised <S%G818><s%> the poor. <S%G4434><s%> Do not rich <S%G4145><s%> men oppress <S%G2616><s%> you, and draw <S%G1670><s%> you before <S%G1519><s%> the judgment <S%G2922><s%> seats?
Do not they blaspheme <S%G987><s%> that worthy <S%G2570><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> by the which <S%G3588><s%> you are called? <S%G1941><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> you fulfill <S%G5055><s%> the royal <S%G937><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the scripture, <S%G1124><s%> You shall love <S%G25><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself, <S%G4572><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> well: <S%G2573><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> you have respect <S%G4380><s%> to persons, <S%G4380><s%> you commit <S%G2038><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> and are convinced <S%G1651><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> as transgressors. <S%G3848><s%>
For whoever <S%G3748><s%> shall keep <S%G5083><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> law, <S%G3551><s%> and yet offend <S%G4417><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> point, he is guilty <S%G1777><s%> of all. <S%G3956><s%>

For he that said, <S%G2036><s%> Do not commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery, <S%G3431><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> Do not kill. <S%G5407><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you commit <S%G3431><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> adultery, <S%G3431><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> if you kill, <S%G5407><s%> you are become <S%G1096><s%> a transgressor <S%G3848><s%> of the law. <S%G3551><s%>
So <S%G3779><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> you, and so <S%G3779><s%> do, <S%G4160><s%> as they that shall be judged <S%G2919><s%> by the law <S%G3551><s%> of liberty. <S%G1657><s%>

For he shall have judgment <S%G2920><s%> without <S%G448><s%> mercy, <S%G448><s%> that has showed <S%G4160><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> mercy; <S%G1656><s%> and mercy <S%G1656><s%> rejoices <S%G2620><s%> against <S%G2620><s%> judgment. <S%G2920><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> does it profit, <S%G3786><s%> my brothers, <S%G80><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> he has <S%G2192><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> not works? <S%G2041><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> him?
If <S%G1437><s%> a brother <S%G80><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> sister <S%G79><s%> be naked, <S%G1131><s%> and destitute <S%G3007><s%> of daily <S%G2184><s%> food, <S%G5160><s%>

And one <S%G5100><s%> of you say <S%G2036><s%> to them, Depart <S%G5217><s%> in peace, <S%G1515><s%> be you warmed <S%G2328><s%> and filled; <S%G5526><s%> notwithstanding you give <S%G1325><s%> them not those <S%G3588><s%> things which are needful <S%G2006><s%> to the body; <S%G4983><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> does it profit? <S%G3786><s%>
Even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> it has <S%G2192><s%> not works, <S%G2041><s%> is dead, <S%G3498><s%> being alone. <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1438><s%>

Yes, <S%G235><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> may say, <S%G2046><s%> You have <S%G2192><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> and I have works: <S%G2041><s%> show <S%G1166><s%> me your faith <S%G4102><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> your works, <S%G2041><s%> and I will show <S%G1166><s%> you my faith <S%G4102><s%> by my works. <S%G2041><s%>

You believe <S%G4100><s%> that there is one <S%G1520><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> well: <S%G2573><s%> the devils <S%G1140><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> believe, <S%G4100><s%> and tremble. <S%G5425><s%>
But will <S%G2309><s%> you know, <S%G1097><s%> O vain <S%G2756><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> that faith <S%G4102><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> is dead? <S%G3498><s%>

Was not Abraham <S%G11><s%> our father <S%G3962><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> by works, <S%G2041><s%> when he had offered <S%G399><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> his son <S%G5207><s%> on the altar? <S%G2379><s%>

See <S%G991><s%> you how <S%G3754><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> worked <S%G4903><s%> with his works, <S%G2041><s%> and by works <S%G2041><s%> was faith <S%G4102><s%> made <S%G5048><s%> perfect? <S%G5048><s%>

And the scripture <S%G1124><s%> was fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and it was imputed <S%G3049><s%> to him for righteousness: <S%G1343><s%> and he was called <S%G2564><s%> the Friend <S%G5384><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
You see <S%G3708><s%> then <S%G5106><s%> how that by works <S%G2041><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> is justified, <S%G1344><s%> and not by faith <S%G4102><s%> only. <S%G3440><s%>

Likewise <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was not Rahab <S%G4460><s%> the harlot <S%G4204><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> by works, <S%G2041><s%> when she had received <S%G5264><s%> the messengers, <S%G32><s%> and had sent <S%G1524><s%> them out another <S%G2087><s%> way? <S%G3598><s%>

For as the body <S%G4983><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> is dead, <S%G3498><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> is dead <S%G3498><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
